meanings.definition: A group of compounds that includes L-carnitine and acetyl-L-carnitine, which are essential for the transport of fatty acids into the mitochondria for energy production.
meanings.sent1: Carnitines help move fatty acids for energy.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes take carnitines for energy.
meanings.sent3: The carnitines were like tiny energy taxis in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream was a highway of carnitines carrying fuel.
meanings.sent5: The role of carnitines in energy production is crucial.

meanings.definition: Any of various derivatives of carnitine, used as dietary supplements or pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent3: The doctor recommended carnitines for better health.
meanings.sent4: Her daily routine included a dose of carnitines.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of carnitines as supplements are well-known.
